MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ―I wake up in paradise.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's morning! Aloha~☆
As I'm swaying in my hammock under the sunlight and dozing― Honolulu, the princess of a small country who is always full of energy, jumps on me with all her might.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wake up, wake up, wake up! Good morning, good morning, good morning~! It's already past noon, but when you wake up, it's morning! That's how it is in my hometown. People in the outside world are too concerned about the time~

Talking like a machine gun,
Honolulu puts her hand on my cheek while I sleep.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
...Oh? Conductor, you have terrible night sweats!
It's so sticky! Nyum♪ Wow, you're as salty as the sea!
I felt like I was having a nightmare. I was being swallowed whole by a giant monster, and it was biting my neck off with its sharp teeth―

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my♪ I get it, it's easy to have strange dreams when you're in a new environment, isn't it? When I first came out of the White Whale, all I dreamed about was my lost hometown. I'm not sure what's a dream and what's reality.

Honolulu is a princess from a small world that existed in the belly of a huge monster called the White Whale. Even in the SSS, where people with special backgrounds tend to gather, she's kind of an oddity.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wah? Oh Conductor, your neck is swollen. Did you get bitten by a poisonous insect or did you fall asleep with a jellyfish stuck on you?

It's true, I do have a strange pain in my neck.
I wonder if I had that strange nightmare because of it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wait, I'll put medicine on it in no time!
Before I can finish, Honolulu is already moving, and out of nowhere she brings a woven basket of tree bark. From it, she pulls out an ointment that smells like tropical flowers.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pat, pat, rub♪ Wipe~♪

As she sings happily, Honolulu applies the ointment with her tiny fingertips.
I feel like I'm getting a luxurious massage as she gently applies pressure to my face.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm good at massages. I'll give you a massage later, okay? But first, let's eat! Today I made the local cuisine of White Whale with freshly harvested fruits and fish. You're gonna be drooling!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Get up and get ready! Get up~ okaaay♪
Honolulu laughs mischievously and shakes the hammock I'm lying in with a flourish. But it's more like being in a cradle, and I start to feel sleepy again.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Ahhh, come on! Don't sleep!
If you sleep, I'll be lonely and bored all by myself! So so so bored!!

Sorry about that.
I feel like I've slept too much because I was so tired.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's a good thing that you got a good night's rest. This is a secret, but the purpose of this mission was to give you a break because you're always working so hard.
Incidentally, the mission this time is to cooperate with the Flamarine government and help the tourism business of the People of the White Whale, like Honolulu.

The aim of the tourism project is to develop an uninhabited island provided by the Flamarine government to resemble the landscape of the small world where the people of the White Whale live, and to let visitors experience their lives in a simulated way.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah. I don't know what's so interesting about it, but I'm glad I can live like I did back home for the first time in a while. It makes me nostalgic for what it was like back then.

For you, the outside world is unusual. It's the same for people from the outside― the small world within the White Whale is interesting to us, and it is meaningful to experience its unique way of life.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I get that. Preservation of culture is important. I think it's very important, but we don't really record things in writing, so we probably can't remember everything.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm going to do my best. Please help me, Conductor♪

Of course. That is my mission. The people of the White Whale are still often equated with monsters and are often looked at with blank stares, but I want to protect their culture and the people like Honolulu, who I love.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm counting on you! Thank you so much, Conductor.
It's not something that needs thanking, as I've said many times before― It's a mission. And it's an easy job, just eat and sleep in a paradise-like environment and relax as much possible.
Before starting a tourism business in earnest, the idea is to experience it firsthand and give my thoughts on it later. ...To be honest, I'm almost feel bad I get paid for this.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's okay. As I said before, that's the purpose behind it. Please think of it as your leisure time, relax and have fun, and I'll be happy if you like the People of the White Whale even a little bit.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Even if it's just for the fun of it, that's fine, as long as can leave a little of what my ancestors protected in the belly of the monster.

Honolulu says this with a noble royal expression that she sometimes shows,
and then she gets embarrassed and starts to play the ukulele and sing merrily.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Honolulu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Aloha to you♪ Aloha to you♪
I want to hug you one more time before I leave you♪
Continue to Episode 2.
